ARABIC: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْحَىُّ ٱلْقَيُّومُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah, there is no god but Him, the Living, the Self-Sustaining.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God: there is no god but He, the living, eternal, self-subsisting, ever sustaining.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah, the Ever-Living, the Self-Subsisting, Who sustains the entire order of the universe - there is no God but He.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God exists. He is the only Lord, the Everlasting and the Guardian of life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah – none is worthy of worship, except Him, He is Alive (eternally, on His own) and the Upholder (keeps others established).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah! None has the right to be worshipped but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah, (there is) no god but He, the Everliving, the Self-subsisting by Whom all things subsist
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God, there is no god but He, the Living, the Everlasting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah! There is no god save Him, the Alive, the Eternal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God! There is no deity save Him, the Living, the Sustainer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah There is no god but He, the Living, the Sustainer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah—there is no god except Him—is the Living One, the All-sustainer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah! There is no god but He,-the Living, the Self-Subsisting, Eternal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah! La ilaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah! There is no god except He, the Living, the Everlasting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God, there is no god but He, the Living, the Eternal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:2] God! There is no god except Him, the Living, the Eternal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah! There is no God save Him, the Alive) Who dies not and is not evanescent, (the Eternal) the Self- subsistent Who has no beginning.
